item.title: Roblox unveils Roblox Cube GenAI and other game dev tools for GDC
item.description: Roblox introduced its Roblox Cube AI tools, the core generative AI system for building 3D objects and scenes.

item.title: GGWP adds voice moderation for Unity’s Vivox voice chat and Gorilla Tag
item.description: GGWP, a brand safety platform for online communities, said its voice moderation tools are being used by Unity's Vivox and Another Axiom.

item.title: Klang Games partners with Google Cloud on AI-driven simulation game Seed
item.description: Klang, the pioneering studio behind the ambitious simulation Seed, announced a strategic partnership with Google Cloud.

item.title: Inside Zoom’s AI evolution: From basic meeting tools to agentic productivity platform powered by LLMs and SLMs
item.description: Zoom's CTO explains how the web conferencing vendor’s technology has evolved and expanded into agentic AI capabilities.

item.title: Inching towards AGI: How reasoning and deep research are expanding AI from statistical prediction to structured problem-solving
item.description: GUEST: AI has evolved at an astonishing pace. What seemed like science fiction just a few years ago is now an undeniable reality. Back in 2017, my fir...
